actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to permit the Federal Communications Commission to employ voluntary services for purposes of monitoring violations of the Act by amateur station operators.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to permit the Federal Communications Commission to utilize the voluntary services of any individual licensed to operate an amateur radio station to monitor violations relating to amateur station transmissions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to permit the Federal Communications Commission to employ voluntary services for purposes of monitoring violations of the Act by amateur station operators.
